name: As it should
description:
The world was thrown into darkness, an undead sits upon the throne, but in this world, those who dwell in the dark are fated to wither in light-  Countless brave souls flood his dark castle as we speak, for how much longer can he hold them back?

Shift while moving to dash

Right click while idle to use ranged attack

Left click while idle to use melee attack

Press + on keypad to increase Resolution

Press - on keypad to decrease Resolution

Press R to restart game
